translation: As the ignorant act out of attachment to action, O Bharata, so should the wise act without attachment, wishing for the welfare of the world.
commentary: 3.25 Attached attached? in action to action? The ignorant the ignorant? such as as? do act? India Or Bharata? should act? learned the wise? And so? unattached unattached? Chikirshuh wishing? lokasamgraham the welfare of the world.Commentary The ignorant man works in expectation of fruits. He says? I will do such and such work and will have such and such fruit. But the wise man who knows the Self? serves
